participant_1.background:
I am a little light for my age, but I am growing well.
i enjoy playing computer games.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
i was born premature.
I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat.

I have no siblings, but I do have a few friends who love to come over and try my new coffee flavors.

i eat ice cream when i am sad.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just got home from work, and I'm about to make some coffee.
Oh, that sounds nice! Do you work at a coffee shop?
I do! I've been working there for about a year now, and I love it.
That's great! I've always wanted to work in a coffee shop.
It's really fun! I get to meet a lot of interesting people, and I get to drink free coffee all day long.
That's awesome! I love coffee, so that would be a dream job for me.
It's definitely not a bad gig.
No, I don't have any siblings. I'm an only child.
Oh, that's too bad. I have a younger sister, and she's my best friend.
I'm sure she's great! I've always wanted a sibling, but my parents never had any more kids.
Well, you're welcome to come over and hang out with my sister and me anytime.
Thanks! I might take you up on that sometime.
Awesome! So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with some friends, or I might just stay in and watch a movie.
Sounds like fun. I'm going to go play some video games.
Have fun! Talk to you later.
